document_name: Human Security PRODOC 23MARCH09 revised and final.docx

outputs.output_descr: Support the mainstreaming of sustainable livelihood approaches into development frameworks .Capacity of decision makers and civil society, especially women, youth and disadvantaged groups developed for effective interaction and participation in decision making. Responsive conflict management programmes institutionalized and structures strengthen

project_descr: Incorporate human security approaches for sustainable development in deprived and conflict prone communities in Northern Ghana
